name: Your fellow marshmallow
description:
You control a marshmallow who doesn't want to get burnt. Try to avoid the sparkles to not get burnt. The marshmallow follows the mouse pointer. My best score is 82 seconds, try to beat it!

Game made in Godot for the Trijam. The theme was "let's go camping" and the game was made in 2 hours and 33 minutes.
